resources.string: The Rotunda at the University of Virginia was designed by Thomas Jefferson as the architectural and academic heart of his community of scholars, or what he termed the \"academical village\".
This is a clock tower near the stadium and AFC.
This is Rice Hall. Where CS majors live.
This is Nau Hall. There\'s a Starbucks here.
This is the Homer Statue whose butt drunk people kiss.
This is the Chapel. People get married here.
